Posts.Content: Godsaveus wrote: My mother Age-48 Left Breast IDC of grade2 (ER-,PR-,HER2neu+) stage 2b or 3a ( T2=5cm ,N1= 3 of 21 lymph nodes effected, M0) Left MASTECTAMY surgery on 6-12-2011. Chemotherapy started after 35 days of operation. 4*ADRIAMYCIN 4*TAXOTARE (each cycle after 21 days) Followed by 25 days of RADIOTHERAPY. Followed by 17 cycle of HERCEPTIN (Tratsumab) each cycle after 21 days) While on 14 th Herceptin a 3 centimeter singlue nodule is seen in right Lung during routine x ray check.Through CTscan it was clearly seen.Onc told us that biopsy is risky because it is lung.:( But he is 90% sure that it is metastasis.:( I am in deep sorrow. After having the class frontline therapies including HERCEPTIN it is now metastaized to lungs.:( Dx 12/5/2011, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 3/12 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
